text: There is always a type of man who says he loves his fellow men, and expects to make a living at it.
author: E. W. Howe

text: Men have as exaggerated an idea of their rights as women have of their wrongs.
author: E. W. Howe

text: Law describes the way things would work if men were angels.
author: Christopher Dawson

text: A lot of times, women don't get the male perspective in regards to a relationship, what men go through when they're not really dealing well.
author: Morris Chestnut

text: Men are different. When they are in love they may also have other girlfriends.
author: Zhang Ziyi
